content: Check all frontend files for compilation errors and warnings
Check backend for Python syntax errors and import issues
Verify all database models have required fields
Check for unused console.log and debug code
Verify all API endpoints have proper error handling
Check for hardcoded values that should be configurable
Verify all translations exist for both EN and ID
Check for missing indexes or performance issues
Verify cascade deletes work for all entity types
Final smoke test of critical workflows
